title: 5 looks we love this week: Victoria Beckham, Regina King, Natalie Portman and more
text:
This week, we saw nothing short of amazing looks from celebrities many of us adore.

Victoria Beckham was spotted all over New York City in a plethora of posh looks while notables such as Regina King dominated the red carpet.

'Twas a good week in fashion for sure.

Scroll ahead to see just what we mean.

Victoria Beckham

Raymond Hall/GC Images via Getty Images

The singer-turned-businesswoman was spotted headed to "The View" in a chic black and white ensemble.

Lucy Liu

Taylor Hill/WireImage via Getty Images

Liu shined bright in a ruffled red dress by Greta Constantine while attending the 2019 Hudson River Park Gala.

Issa Rae

Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/FilmMagic via Getty Images

For this year's Elle Women In Hollywood event, Rae absolutely stunned in a yellow Ralph Lauren gown.

Natalie Portman

Emma Mcintyre/Getty Images for ELLE

Portman put the "c" in classy with this sleeveless couture look from Dior.

Regina King

Leon Bennett/WireImage via Getty Images

King stole the blue carpet at the premiere of "Watchmen" in a gorgeous black silk-taffeta ruffled gown by Oscar De La Renta.
description: Check out five great outfits from this week from Victoria Beckham, Regina King, Natalie Portman, and more.
